scripts.test: npm run test-pg && npm run test-mysql
scripts.test-pg: MODE="pg" CONN="postgres://meteor:meteor@127.0.0.1/meteor_test" CHANNEL="package_test" DEBUG=0 STATS=0 nodeunit test/index.js
scripts.test-mysql: MODE="my" HOST="localhost" USER="root" PASSWORD="numtel" DATABASE="live_select_test" SERVER_ID=349 DEBUG=0 STATS=0 nodeunit test/index.js
